title: Adapting Farming Practices To The Regional Environment | Resilient Farms in Germany

tasks.task: Operating a farmhouse and farm business
subtasks: Cleaning and maintaining the farmhouse, including the kitchen and bedrooms
Running a farm shop or stand to sell homemade products
Feeding milk goats with hay and managing their living space
Collecting and processing goat milk using a milking machine
Producing and aging various types of goat cheese (fresh, soft, semi-hard, hard)

tasks.task: Solar energy systems and energy efficiency
subtasks: Installing and maintaining solar water heating systems
Evaluating and optimizing energy consumption on the farm
Driving and maintaining tractors and other farm vehicles

Handcrafting different types of goat cheese
Developing and testing new cheese varieties
Adapting traditional methods with modern twist (e.g., combining with art)
Participating in local markets to sell goat cheese and other artisanal products
Using social media or local networks to promote the farm's niche products
